title: Dan Dan Noodles
content: ["75ml Chili oil", "Crispy Chili sauce", "Wheat noodles", "~200g Minced Pork", "2 heads of Pak Choy", "~1 tsp Neutral oil to brown the pork in", "2 tsp Hoisin Sauce", "2 tsp Shaoxing Wine", "1 tsp dark soy sauce", "2 tbsp tahini", "3 tbsp light soy sauce", "1 tsp sugar", "0.75 tsp Five Spice Powder (0.5 in the meat, 0.25 in the sauce)", "0.5 tsp Sichuan Peppercorn Powder", "2 Cloves of Garlic (minced)", "Chopped Peanuts", "Spring Onions"]

title: Pad Kra Pao
content: ["3 tbsp of vegetable oil", "2 shallots, thinly sliced", "7 cloves of garlic, minced", "3+ bird's eye chilies", "450g of beef mince (~10% fat)", "1 tsp of sugar", "1 tbsp of fish sauce", "1 tbsp of light soy sauce", "2 tsp of dark soy sauce", "2 tsp of oyster sauce", "100ml chicken stock", "large handful of thai basil leaves (maybe 100g)"]

title: Sausage Pasta
content: ["1 pack of herby/spiced sausages. Cumberlands are good", "1 large glass of dry white wine", "1 white onion", "500ml of vegetable stock", "500g of pasta", "Parmigiano", "Black pepper"]

title: Smacked Cucumber Salad
content: ["1 large cucumber", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "2 tablespoons light soy sauce", "1 tablespoon rice vinegar", "1 tablespoon sesame oil", "1/2 tablespoon sugar", "1 teaspoon chiu chow chili oil", "a handful of chopped coriander", "2 spring onions, thinly sliced", "1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds (optional)"]
